TEXT.TITLE: NYFE SEAT SOLD FOR 200 DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The New York Stock Exchange said a seat on the New York Futures Exchange sold for 200 dlrs, which is unchanged from the previous sale, made yesterday. The NYSE said the current bid is 200 dlrs and the current offer is 300 dlrs. Reuter
